title: ESPN Films 30 for 30 series
content:
[http://worldsoccertalk.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/30-for-30.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315172432/http:/worldsoccertalk.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/30-for-30.jpg "http://worldsoccertalk.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/30-for-30.jpg")

I don't need to know the ESPN logo font, just the font used to create the 30 for 30. Thanks!
author: bdlily

comments.content:
With the distressing, the best match I can come up with is:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-old-style-cond/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315172432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-old-style-cond/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-old-style-cond/")

However, the size of your sample makes it difficult to be sure, and it is highly likely that the distressing was achieved via Photoshop.
Thank you! That looks good and I'll use that.
